name: Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide
indications: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream usp indicated treatment cutaneous candidiasis ; demonstrated nystatin-steroid combination provides greater benefit nystatin component alone first days treatment .
contraindications: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream usp usually applied affected areas twice daily morning evening gently thoroughly massaging preparation skin . cream discontinued symptoms persist 25 days therapy ( , laboratory tests ) . nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream usp used occlusive dressings .
warningsAndPrecautions: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream usp supplied 30 g , 60 g tubes . ndc numbers follows : 30 g tube 68180-545-02 60 g tube 68180-545-03 storage store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . avoid freezing . lupin registered trademarks lupin pharmaceuticals , inc. manufactured : lupin pharmaceuticals , inc. naples , fl 34108 united states manufactured : lupin limited pithampur ( m.p . ) - 454 775 india november 2024 id : 278152

indications_original: Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream USP is indicated for the treatment of cutaneous candidiasis; it has been demonstrated that the nystatin-steroid combination provides greater benefit than the nystatin component alone during the first few days of treatment.
contraindications_original:
Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream USP is usually applied to the affected areas twice daily in the morning and evening by gently and thoroughly massaging the preparation into the skin. The cream should be discontinued if symptoms persist after 25 days of therapy (see PRECAUTIONS, Laboratory Tests).
                  
                  Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream USP should not be used with occlusive dressings.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream USP is supplied in 30 g, and 60 g tubes.
                  NDC numbers are as follows:
                  30 g Tube        68180-545-02
                  60 g tube         68180-545-03
                  
                     STORAGE
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Avoid Freezing.

adverseReactions_original: These preparations are contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of their components.
